name: verifiability
content:

the fact of being able to be proved to be true or correct: The criterion which we use to test the genuineness of apparent statements of fact is the criterion of verifiability. In elections, one method of good auditing is end-to-end verifiability that allows you, as a voter, to see whether your vote has been changed.
